title: Zero-Kilometer 2021 Honda HRC Grom Cup
description: This 2021 Honda HRC Grom Cup bike was produced for the Japanese market for the one-make racing series for the Honda Grom, and this example shows zero kilometers. The bike is finished in red, white, and two shades of blue HRC livery and is powered by a 124cc four-stroke single paired with a five-speed transmission. Equipment includes a lower cowl, a tail panel, an Endurance Racing upswept exhaust, electronic fuel injection, a black solo seat, rear set foot controls, 12″ alloy wheels, and disc brakes. This HRC Grom Cup was acquired by the selling dealer in 2023, and it is now offered for off-road use only in Florida with a rear stand and a bill of sale.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a Zero-Kilometer 2021 Honda HRC Grom Cup at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #191,580.

The bike has not been ridden by the selling dealer. A video showing the bike running can be viewed in the gallery. Power is sent to the rear wheel through a five-speed transmission and a drive chain.
